summary: Fixed next_id() inconsistency by removing redundant conditional check. The max() function with default=0 already handles empty list case correctly, returning 1 when empty. Added comprehensive test coverage for edge cases including non-contiguous IDs.
implementation_notes: Simplified next_id() by removing redundant 'if todos else 1' check
max() with default=0 returns 0 for empty list, so 0+1=1 is correct
Added docstring to clarify ID generation behavior (monotonically increasing, never reused)
Added comprehensive regression tests for non-contiguous IDs and edge cases
risks: Low - simplification of existing logic with same behavior
